text: Altermann is a German surname. Notable people of the surname include the following: * Karl-Heinz Altermann (1922-2013), German officer * Theodor Altermann (1885–1915), Estonian actor, theatre producer and director == See also == * "Alter Mann", a song by Rammstein from Sehnsucht * Alterman Category:German-language surnames de:Altermann
title: Altermann
